Work.name: Korea Institute of Science and Technology, Center for AI Research
Work.summary: I am developing an AI-driven Multiview Vision-Language Model (VLM) to improve scene understanding from multiple perspectives. This research aims to effectively process overlapping visual information from multiview images by leveraging token merging strategies before passing the data to a Large Language Model (LLM).

publications.name: A Combined Twin and Single Network for Fast and Robust Inspection of IC Substrates
publications.summary: Conducted research on IC substrate and EUV-based semiconductor inspection using advanced machine vision techniques. Developed and optimized defect detection algorithms for semiconductor products by comparing reference images with test images to identify inconsistencies.

publications.name: Personal Mobility Safe Driving System with Knowledge Distillation
publications.publisher: 2023 IEEE 20th International Conference on Ubiquitous Robots
publications.summary: Propose a deep learning-based safety system for personal mobility. Use user-side and roadside images to check helmet usage, forward-looking behavior, and driving on sidewalks or near intersections.

publications.name: Action Recognition using 3D Point Cloud from Frequency Modulated Continuous Wave Radar Signals
publications.summary: Motion classification using Support Tensor Machine (SVM) with 3D point cloud data collected with FMCW radar.

publications.name: 2-input deep learning based multi-tasking safe driving system for e-scooter
publications.publisher: The Institute of Electronics and Information Engineers
publications.summary: Utilize CNN-based models for detecting helmet usage and forward-looking behavior in user images, and also detecting pedestrian zone riding and estimating the closest distance with road images.

projects.name: Deep Learning-Based Semiconductor Product Inspection
projects.summary: Thesis for Master's degree under Prof. Jeongtae Kim. Developed a lightweight twin network-based defect detection system for IC substrates, designed to be robust against mis-registration and characteristic differences.

projects.summary: Developed a deep learning-based safety system specifically designed for personal mobility devices under Prof. Kahyun Lee. Submitted one international and one domestic conference paper on this topic.

projects.name: 3D Beamforming-Based Estimation of Breathing and Heart Rates
projects.summary: Investigated an approach for estimating breathing and heartbeat rates utilizing 3D beamforming-based frequency modulated continuous wave (FMCW) radar signals under Prof. Jeongtae Kim. Demonstrated superior performance compared to conventional 2D beamforming methods.

projects.name: Application of Deep Learning Techniques in Radar Signal Processing
projects.summary: Applied deep learning techniques to radar signal processing for various applications, including fall detection, pose estimation, and people counting from radar data, under Prof. Jeongtae Kim.
highlights: Fall Detection and Pose Estimation: 3D point cloud generation, RNN, LSTM
People Counting from Radar Data: 2D heatmap generation, CNN
Key technologies: Radar Signal Processing, Deep Learning for Signals
